#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    int n,k; char ch; int i;

    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {   int c=0,m=0;
        cin>>n>>k;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
           cin>>ch;
    //       cout<<ch;
           if(ch=='#')
           {
               c++;
               if(c>m) m=c;
           }
           else c=0;

        }

        if(m>=k) cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        else cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    }
return 0;
}
